TopicTitle: Custom RCS Effects Now Possible Without Plugins?

Articles.Content:
Noticed in the latest RO release.



In the definitions.



Any examples on how to use it? Very excited! 



	Update to KSP 1.0.5, no longer require ModuleRCSFX, BetterBuoyancy, or CrossFeedEnabler (all stock now).
Edited December 3, 2015 by Beale

According to Starwaster "ModuleRCSFX functionality has been implemented in ModuleRCS. AFAIK it's not going to be necessary any longer? "

[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92290-1-0-4-ModuleRCSFX-v4-2-Aug-23-OBSOLETE-IN-1-0-5/page11[/url]

[quote name='martinezfg11']According to Starwaster "ModuleRCSFX functionality has been implemented in ModuleRCS. AFAIK it's not going to be necessary any longer? "

[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92290-1-0-4-ModuleRCSFX-v4-2-Aug-23-OBSOLETE-IN-1-0-5/page11[/url][/QUOTE]

From that thread also, first page.

[CODE]
** RCS Effects **
Currently disabled pending rework.
[/CODE]

Not clear if that part made it into stock :)

The Not working pending rework part? Yes it did. :P

That is to say neither stock nor, despite its name, ModuleRCSFX, support custom fx.

[quote name='NathanKell']The Not working pending rework part? Yes it did. :P

That is to say neither stock nor, despite its name, ModuleRCSFX, support custom fx.[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the answer!

Ah, I understand if that is the case. :) Edited November 20, 2015 by Beale
